timeline.bodyText:
Seems we need builder for video.
Usually, creating of builder is expensive operation for performance, pls avoid if possible.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText:
What is happen if the field will be null?
Seems we need to fix the case for all mentioned fields here.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText: Pls combine this condition with upper one.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText:
It is to cryptic to see. May be it will be better to add universal method like positiveOrNull(..) for each param.
Then in condition below we can compare with NULL only.
timeline.author: rpanchyk
